function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Sample comes from a subset of chilean construction stakeholders","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear cause and effect of impacts on construction projects due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of points among multiple stakeholders in the construction industry may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of covid-19 impacts on specific stakeholder categories in the risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in impacts among multiple stakeholders","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic losses due to limited liquidity, delays in
